reviewTitle: Friendly and relaxed with great food
review_details: Friendly staff , great food and relaxed atmosphere. We highly recommend ! Perfect for a family Saturday night meal
Words don't do it justice ! Just go ! Incredible in every way . Won't ever forget this experience . My 12 and 14 year old loved it too .

Great meal here - welcome change from
Japanese food ! Very tasty and well cooked . And the nan better than any we have had in the UK !

Wonderful Ryokan for an authentic experience but still some home comforts . Great food ( a bit challenging for the kids - so they took up the option of a continental breakfast ) . Private shower and bath ,very clean room ,lovely features and super helpful and friendly .

What a wonderful guide Christos is . He took us around the island to some magical
Places and kept us entertained with his amazing knowledge and interesting stories . Cannot recommend highly enough !

Just back from an amazing holiday in Santorini . Magical and beautiful place - views like you have never seen before . Wonderful pool and hot tub in Sapphire villa . Delicious breakfast overlooking the Caldera .But the holiday was made by being looked after by Nikos . He organised everything - and nothing wad too much trouble . He seems to work 24/7 but always smiling ,helpful and interested . Incredible service . We really hope to return . Thank you ! Foye , steve , Aimee and Alice

We enjoyed a wonderful day with Anthi and her crew ( and her sister's gorgeous new born baby and beautiful little boy ) . She was such a lovely and kind person ( especially when I felt a bit sea sick ) and looked after us very well . Most of all though we loved to hear about her fishing family , how they live , what they do and feel her passion and pride . I loved the fact she was the captain ! We caught fish , swam in the sea and had a perfect meal of fresh fish on the boat . Met some other lovely people and had a very memorable day .
Do this if you like the water and want to do something authentic . A great day .
Thank you !

Highly recommend this place . Great food , service and vibe ! Loved it so much - went twice ! Steak was incredible , sushi really good . Kids loved the desserts too . Great atmosphere - and good if you want a change from traditional Greek food ( although they have that too ! )
